text: Magnolia ernestii, the yellow lily-tree, is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Further reading== *XIANG, Cheng-hua, et al. "Genetic Diversity of Endangered Plant Michelia wilsonii [J]." Journal of Northwest Forestry University 5 (2009): 016. ernestii Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Trees of China Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Magnolia ernestii
